fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 9.50 points or 0.05% to settle at 19,398.50. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.55% to 11.88. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and Eicher Motors were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
